Comments: Whether the quantization of Intensities is supposed to happen on a per-image basis or on a per-ROI basis

FixedBinNumber (FBN): the bins are uniformly distributed across the minimum and maximum extent in the ROI/Image as defined under 'Quantization_Extent'; FixedBinSize (FBS): bins are added in a fixed step between the minimum and maximum extent in the ROI/Image as defined under 'Quantization_Extent' the requested size is provided in 'Bins'; Equal: each bin holds an equal number of intensities
Resamples all images and masks to this value of voxel/pixel resolution before computations (0: no resampling): reduce this number of more accuracy
Type of interpolator to use if resampling is happening; ignored if m_resamplingResolution = 0
Type of interpolator to use if resampling is happening; ignored if m_resamplingResolution = 0
Controls whether non-Intensity features are calculated along the slice with the largest area along the 3 axes: valid for 3D images only
Specify how to handle features with NaN values 'Remove' removes the feature from output - keep in mind this might cause issues with output file in multi-subject (i.e. Training/Batch) mode
0:largest connected component in ROI; N: all connected components larger than (N*10^-6) of total image size are taken into account
Whether or not to calculate the Feret Diameter (substantially increases computation time)
For calculating 2D slice (maximum area along specified axis) or full 3D volume features
The number of bins (FBN) or size of each bin (FBS) to calculate for the Histogram
The starting index of the bin; leave to '-666' for this not to be considered
The number of bins (FBN) or size of each bin (FBS) to calculate for the Histogram
Radius around the center voxel which can be in mm as well (needs to be defined as float in same space as input image/mask)
Either individual offset values or averaged computation for individual offsets might not work)
The number of bins (FBN) or size of each bin (FBS) to calculate for the Histogram
Radius around the center voxel which can be in mm as well (needs to be defined as float in same space as input image/mask)
Either individual offset values or averaged

Radius around the center voxel
Either individual offset values or averaged
The number of bins (FBN) or size of each bin (FBS) to calculate for the Histogram
Radius around the center voxel
Either individual offset values or averaged
Radius around the center voxel/pixel (if defined as float it is assumed to be in world coordinates and if as Integer it is assumed to be in image coordinates)
The total number of neighbors to consider for computation
0: original LBP | 1: uniform LBP | 2: rotation invariant LBP | 3: uniform + rotation invariant LBP
Whether computations across the entire image need to happen in addition to lattice
Window of single lattice node (number based on experiments by CBIG) - should be same as Step for non-overlapping tiles
Step size to increase for consecutive lattice node (number based on experiments by CBIG) - should be same as Step for non-overlapping tiles
The boundary condition to use for lattice construction
Full considers all non-zero pixels and adds weight whereas ROI considers only the indeces having same value as center pixel and None disregards the patch
